title: Patcher/Client
body: Hello. I'm not very good with programs and anything technical so I'm asking for help. I was wondering if anyone could tell me how to unpin League of Legends from my task bar without it disappearing. When I unpin the LoL client [Not sure if client or patcher; the icon with the yellow "_L_" and blue background] from the task bar, I'm unable to find it anywhere on my computer, even in the LolClient folder. Evidently, I'm unable to play league at all.

replies.body: It helped a lot! I'm able to log back into league now. Thank you so much, appreciate the help!

There's no way to unpin a taskbar shortcut without it immediately disappearing because unpinning it is supposed to make it go away. Not to worry, though, you can achieve replacing your shortcut with the steps below:

1) Unpin the current shortcut from the taskbar

2) Locate your League installation directory (likely **C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**)

3) Right click on the file named **lol.launcher.admin.exe**

4) Select **pin to taskbar**

That's it! Let me know if this helped you out.
